sufian.video.stream.packetizer

Class H264Packetizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • sufian.video.stream.packetizer.VideoPacketizer
      • sufian.video.stream.packetizer.H264Packetizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class H264Packetizer
extends VideoPacketizer
    A subclass of VideoPacketizer for packetizing H.264 encoded video.
    Author:
    Sufian Latif
    See Also:
    RFC 3984 for RTP packetization scheme for H.264 video:
    • Section 5.3 for NAL unit header format
    • Section 5.4 for packetization modes
    • Section 5.8 for fragmentation units

    • Method Detail

      • setH264Params

        public void setH264Params(byte[] _sps,
                 byte[] _pps)
        Sets the values of sps and pps. This method is to be called from the Streamer class to set the values.
        Parameters:
        _sps - Value of SPS
        _pps - Value of PPS

      • sendSPSandPPS

        private void sendSPSandPPS()
                    throws IOException
        Sends SPS and PPS values. This is called before sending each I-frame.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while sending the packet

      • sendSingleNALU

        private void sendSingleNALU()
                     throws IOException
        Sends a whole NAL unit in a single packet. This is called when the length of a NAL unit is less than the maximum packet size.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an error occurs while sending the packet

      • sendFragmentedNALU

        private void sendFragmentedNALU()
                         throws IOException
        Sends a large NAL unit fragmented in multiple packets. This is called when the length of the NAL unit is larger than maximum packet size.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • run

        public void run()
        H264Packetizer's own scheme of packetizing video data.

        Workflow of this method:

        1. Reads and skips the input data until it encounters the 4-byte sequence "mdat"
        2. Starts packetization
        3. While the thread is running
          • Reads a NAL unit
          • If it is an I-frame, sends SPS and PPS packets
          • If the NAL unit is small enough, sends it in one packet
          • Otherwise sends the fragmented NAL unit in multiple packets

      • readNALU

        private int readNALU()
              throws IOException
        Reads a complete NAL unit into buffer.
        Returns:
        Number of bytes read, or -1 if stream input is closed.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the stream is closed or an error occurs
